category.name: wcf.acp.application
category.item: The settings below are used to establish a persistent login for your website; Keep in mind to update these values whenever the domain name or path changes. If you are unsure which values you need to provide, you can safely copy both values from above.
Cookie domain may not contain path components
Cookie domain does not match the domain entered above (sub-domains like “www” may be omitted).
Cookie path does not match the domain path above.
If you’re accessing this application through “http://www.example.com/community/forum/”, please enter “www.example.com”.
Domain may not contain path components
This path is already taken by application “{$conflictApplication->getName()}”
If you’re accessing this application through “http://www.example.com/community/forum/”, please enter “/community/forum/”.
Do you really want to set “{$application->getPackage()->getName()}” as the primary application?

category.name: wcf.acp.bbcode
category.item: Newly created BBCodes will be accessible for everyone. You can restrict usage by editing the specific user group permissions.
List of allowed children is invalid.
Content between BBCode tags will be used as attribute value unless it was explicitly specified
Do you really want to delete the BBCode “[{$bbcode->bbcodeTag}]”?
Disables conversion of bbcodes and smilies.
Do you really want to delete the media provider “{$mediaProvider->title}”?

Provide the link format as a regular expression. One expression per line.
Examples for medium ID detection:
  • (?<ID>[0-9]+) detects a numeric ID.
  • (?<ID>[0-9a-zA-Z]+) detects an alphanumeric ID
The image must be placed inside the directory wcf/icon/.

category.name: wcf.acp.cache
category.item: Do you really want to clear the cache?

category.name: wcf.acp.cronjob
category.item: Day of the month (1 - 31), the cron job should be executed.
Weekday (0 - 6 with Sunday = 0, or mon - sun), the cron job should be executed.
Hours (0 - 23), the cron job should be executed.
Minutes (0 - 59), the cron job should be executed.
Month (1 - 12, or jan - dec), the cron job should be executed.
Configuring cronjobs requires distinct knowledge of the crontab syntax on Unix based systems. More information about this topic can be obtained on the following webpage: Newbie: Intro to cron.
Unable to find the specified class.
Do you really want to delete the cronjob “{$cronjob->description|language}”?
Do you really want to clear the cronjob log?

category.name: wcf.acp.dashboard
category.item: Sort boxes to determine show order. You can enable or disable boxes by moving them between the boxes “Active Boxes” and “Disabled Boxes”.

category.name: wcf.acp.dataImport
category.item: This data will already be imported.
You did not specify any data for importing, import has been aborted.
The selected data type is invalid.

You did not load any application through --packageID={PACKAGE_ID}. If you wish to import application-specific data, you must call this script along with the desired package id. Do you wish to continue the import? [YN]
Required if file-based data (e.g. avatars or attachments) should be imported.

An error occured while trying to access the database:
{$exception->getMessage()}
{$exception->getErrorDesc()}
Unable to find a valid installation with the given path.
Merge users if email address is equal
Do you really want to delete the existing import mappings?

There are import mappings created by a previous import process, these mappings are used to properly handle connections between data from the imported forum and this one. In case you’ve imported all desired data, you can delete the mappings. It is strongly recommended to keep these mappings as long as there is still data to be imported now or in the future.
The selected data source is invalid.
There are no data importers installed.

category.name: wcf.acp.exceptionLog
category.item: No error with the ID “{$exceptionID}” was found.

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Do you really want to delete the user group “{$group->groupName|language}”?
Heads up! You’re a member of this user group, changes may cause yourself being locked out from the Administration Control Panel.
Users of this group may access the Administration Control Panel based upon their granted permissions. This option must be enabled if you wish to grant access to any administrative option.
Users of this group have access to these groups, furthermore you need to specify if these users are allowed to edit these groups.
If any group within “Accessible User Groups” is checked, users may assign these groups to newly created users.
The given value is too high.{if $option->maxvalue !== null} The maximum value is {#$option->maxvalue}.{/if}
The given value is too low.{if $option->minvalue !== null} The minimum value is {#$option->minvalue}.{/if}
Can access page during maintenance mode
Minimum delay between creation of two comments or replies. [time in seconds, 0 to disable]
Selected BBCodes may be used by members of this group.
Can see avatars of other users
All marked BBCodes may be used within the signature.
Determines show order on team page, user rank and “Who is Online” marking based on highest priority.
Adjust the HTML formatting for members of this group in the “Who is Online” list. <strong>%s</strong> results in a bolder appearance.
Minimum period until members may rename themselves. [time in days]

category.name: wcf.acp.index
category.item: “WoltLab®” and “Burning Board®” are registered Community Trade Marks at The Office of Harmonization for the Internal Market (OHIM) in Alicante, Spain.
You are accessing this installation from an unknown domain, possibly caused by moving to a new host. Please update the settings on Manage Applications.
The MySQL configuration option “innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit” is set to “1”, slowing down certain database queries. It is highly recommended to set it’s value to “2”.
The installation will be continued within a few moments, please do not reload this page.

category.item: Chosen CSS class name is invalid.

Please add a label group prior to creating labels.
Do you really want to delete the label group “{$group->groupName}”?

category.name: wcf.acp.language
category.item: Language code is already in use by an installed language.
Please enter the ISO 639-1 language code, you can lookup the language code at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1.
Please enter the ISO 3166-1 country code, you can lookup the country code at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1.
Do you really want to delete the language “{$language->languageName}”?
Errors occured while importing the language file:
Enter the relative path to a valid XML language file.

Enabling multilingualism provides the ability to associate user-generated content with a specific language; Newly created content is automatically associated with the user’s interface language. Users may filter content for specific languages through their settings.
You need to select at least two languages.
The selected language will be used as origin, all phrases will be copied into the new language.

category.name: wcf.acp.masterPassword
category.item: The page or action requires the master password for security reasons, the password will be remembered for your current session. In case you forgot the password, please reset it by removing the file {@$relativeWcfDir}acp/masterPassword.inc.php.
Password is incorrect. In case you forgot the password, please reset it by removing the file {@$relativeWcfDir}acp/masterPassword.inc.php.
Password is regarded unsafe. It should be at least 8 characters, containing upper and lower latin letters, as well as numbers and special symbols.

The master password is the last line of defense, protecting both critical settings and sensitive data. One should choose a rather strong password which is neither known to any 3rd party person nor re-used on other webpages.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: One server per line, you can additionally specify a weight factor to allow load balancing, for example “localhost:11211:67” or “10.0.13.37:31337:33”.
Caching methods different from “Filesystem” require special extensions or services running on your machine.
Memcached uses the machine’s memory to store frequently accessed data, reducing database and filesystem load. Read more about Memcached on memcached.org.
Optionally provide a Proxy-Server for outgoing connections.
Should be left blank except for special circumstances.
Value should be absolute to Document Root, e.g. “/forum” for “http://www.woltlab.com/forum”.
Exceeds the maximum value{if $option->maxvalue !== null} of {#$option->maxvalue}{/if}.
Below the minimum value{if $option->minvalue !== null} of {#$option->minvalue}{/if}.
Downloads a backup of the configuration settings to your local machine. This is not a replacement for a backup!
Compresses content transfered to users, reduces traffic and page load time. Does not affect files, e.g. images.
Prevents Browser’s caching ensuring your users are always viewing the latest content. Increases both traffic and server load.
Values between 1 and 9 are valid, it is recommended to use “1” for good compression without causing high server loads.
Sends the “X-Frame-Options” header to prevent 3rd party sites from embedding this site in a frame (sends “SAMEORIGIN”).
Library used for image processing, e.g. scaling uploaded images. “ImageMagick” is a lot faster, but is not available on every machine.
Stores IP addresses for user-generated content, e.g. sessions, profiles or forum posts.
Email used as a sender for all generated emails
Sender name used for all generated emails
Signature will be appended to every message.
Some servers require the “-f” parameter to send emails. Enable this option if you have any trouble sending emails.
Sender and receiver addresses will be converted into “Name <email@domain.tld>”. This option is not supported by most mail-servers, try turning it off if you experience any issues.
Enables an additional password to protect both critical actions and sensitive data.
Enabling this validation might cause troubles for users with rotating IP addresses.
Show current time in page footer
Timeout in seconds until an inactive user should be displayed as online.
Disables all applications and prevents access from unprivileged users.
Notice displayed to visitors while maintenance mode is enabled
Enables you to use HTML in “Maintenance Notice”.
Show version number in copyright notice
Enables extensive error messages. Should be always disabled in production environments!
Append the attribute “rel="nofollow"” to all external links
The attribute “rel="nofollow"” tells search engines to disregard external links.
Open external links in a new window
Appends the attribute “target="_blank"” to external links, causing the user’s browser to open the link in a new window.
It is strongly recommended to disable this option in productive environments.
Your authentication code is available in the customers area on woltlab.com.
Show WoltLab news on the administration control panel’s start page.
Enables security measures to prevent automatic form submission for bots.
You can request an own API-Key for using reCAPTCHA on the reCAPTCHA website.
Changes storage location for attachments. Heads up! You are responsible to move already existing attachments to the new location.

One word per Line. Using at least one of these words within a message causes an immediate rejection.
Use “*” to match parts: “wolt*” matches “woltlab”
Use “~” to find splitted parts: “wolt~” matches “wolt-lab”
Enables censorship for all messages containing the words below.
You can obtain both your Client ID and Client Secret at GitHub. The Callback URL is: {link controller="GithubAuth" forceFrontend=true appendSession=false}{/link}
You can obtain both your Consumer key and Consumer secret at Twitter. The Callback URL is: {link controller="TwitterAuth" forceFrontend=true appendSession=false}{/link}
You can obtain your APP-ID and Application Secret at Facebook. The OAuth redirect URI is: {link controller="FacebookAuth" forceFrontend=true appendSession=false}{/link}
You can obtain your Client ID and Client Secret at Google. The Redirect-URI is: {link controller="GoogleAuth" forceFrontend=true appendSession=false}{/link}
Enables support for Gravatars (“Global Recognized Avatar”).
Notice: In case the Dashboard is currently defined as landing page, you must set a different landing page through the Page Menu management afterwards.
Password complexity will be validated, unsafe passwords will be rejected.
List of names unavailable for registration, one name per line.
List of email addresses unavailable for registration, one address per line.
List of valid email addresses for registration, one address per line.
Disables registration for all users, new users may be created through an administrator.
Disclaimer must be explicitly accepted during registration.
Enable reCAPTCHA protection for “Send Email to User”
Maximum Height of Images in Signatures
List of user titles unavailable for members, one title per line.
Previous username will be additionally displayed for the given period. [time in days]
Page will be periodically refreshed. [time in seconds, 0 to disable]
Exclude guests from the most-online record
Notifications will be discarded if they are older than the given period. [time in days]
Activities will be discarded if they are older than the given period. [time in days]
Profile visitors will be discarded if they are older than the given period. [time in days]
Users can like their own content
You have entered an invalid value.
The entered code will be appended to the page footer of your site. You can use it to embed services like “Google Analytics” or “Piwik”.

You may replace parts of the title within the URL. You could use it to replace special characters or to expand abbreviations. (One replacement per line)
Examples:
WBB=WoltLab Burning Board
GmbH=Gesellschaft mit beschränkter Haftung
Exclude guests from user online record

category.name: wcf.acp.style
category.item: Content will be appended to the stylesheet and may contain pure CSS. Furthermore you can use LESS including all Mixins provided by Community Framework.

Allows you to override LESS variables not available through the style editor itself. Syntax: “@variableName: variableValue;”, referred variables must be declared prior any attempt to read their value.

Variable “{$error[text]}” is already defined by the style editor

Choose if you want to export the style “{$style->styleName}” as a package. Packages can be installed through the package management or uploaded to the WoltLab® Plugin-Store.
Select components included in export for style “{$style->styleName}”
Upload a preview image for this style, acceptable image types are JPG and PNG. Dimensions should be 102px × 64px, exceeding images will be scaled.
Path for optional images for your style, directory should be located within “images”.
Upload a style from your local machine.
Unable to import the selected style, uploaded file is not a valid style.

Enter a package identifier matching the pattern “tld.domain.packageName”. For exmaple if you own the domain “example.com” and created a style called “Blue Sunrise”, you could pick “com.example.style.blueSunrise” as a valid and descriptive identifier.

category.item: {if $years}{if $years > 1}{#$years} years{else}A year{/if}{/if}{if $months}{if $firstElement != 'months'}{if $firstElement != 'months'}{if $lastElement == 'months'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{#$months} months{else}{if $firstElement == 'months'}A{else}a{/if} month{/if}{/if}{if $weeks}{if $firstElement != 'weeks'}{if $lastElement == 'weeks'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{if $weeks > 1}{#$weeks} weeks{else}{if $firstElement == 'weeks'}A{else}a{/if} week{/if}{/if}{if $days}{if $firstElement != 'days'}{if $lastElement == 'days'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{if $days > 1}{#$days} days{else}{if $firstElement == 'days'}A{else}a{/if} day{/if}{/if}{if $hours}{if $firstElement != 'hours'}{if $lastElement == 'hours'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{if $hours > 1}{#$hours} hours{else}{if $firstElement == 'hours'}An{else}an{/if} hour{/if}{/if}{if $minutes}{if $firstElement != 'minutes' && $lastElement == 'minutes'} and {/if}{if $minutes > 1}{#$minutes} minutes{else}{if $firstElement == 'minutes'}A{else}a{/if} minute{/if}{/if} ago

In {if $years}{if $years > 1}{#$years} years{else}a year{/if}{/if}{if $months}{if $firstElement != 'months'}{if $lastElement == 'months'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{if $months > 1}{#$months} months{else}a month{/if}{/if}{if $weeks}{if $firstElement != 'weeks'}{if $lastElement == 'weeks'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{if $weeks > 1}{#$weeks} weeks{else}a week{/if}{/if}{if $days}{if $firstElement != 'days'}{if $lastElement == 'days'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{if $days > 1}{#$days} days{else}a day{/if}{/if}{if $hours}{if $firstElement != 'hours'}{if $lastElement == 'hours'} and {else}, {/if}{/if}{if $hours > 1}{#$hours} hours{else}an hour{/if}{/if}{if $minutes}{if $firstElement != 'minutes' && $lastElement == 'minutes'} and {/if}{if $minutes > 1}{#$minutes} minutes{else}a minute{/if}{/if}

Note: Post, Attachments and similar content will remain even after your account was deleted.
Your user account will be deleted on {TIME_NOW+7*86400|date}. During this period you can abort deletion on this page.

Due to security reasons every password must be at least {REGISTER_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH} characters long{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_LOWER_CASE || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_UPPER_CASE || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_DIGIT || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_SPECIAL_CHAR}{* *} and contain {* *}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_LOWER_CASE}lower-case letters{/if}{* *}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_UPPER_CASE}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_LOWER_CASE}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_DIGIT || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_SPECIAL_CHAR},{else} and{/if} {/if}upper-case letters{/if}{* *}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_DIGIT}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_LOWER_CASE || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_UPPER_CASE}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_SPECIAL_CHAR},{else} and{/if} {/if}digits{/if}{* *}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_SPECIAL_CHAR}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_LOWER_CASE || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_UPPER_CASE || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_DIGIT} and {/if}special chars{/if}{/if}.
Your new email address must be verified first. You should’ve received an email sent to your new email address containing an activation link. Open the link to verify your new email address.
You have provided an invalid activation code. Click the button below if you wish to request a new activation code.
You may provide a different email address or leave it empty to send the code to the same email address again.
Activiation code has been sent to “{$email}”.
An email containing the 9-digit activation code was sent to “{$__wcf->user->email}”.
Username was already changed within the last {#$__wcf->getSession()->getPermission('user.profile.renamePeriod')} day.
You may enter a custom user title.
Title exceeded the maximum length of {#USER_TITLE_MAX_LENGTH} characters.
Your criteria did not match any member.
Heads up! If you can see this, you are strongly encouraged NOT to fill in the next two input fields!

category.name: wcf.user.register
category.item:
Thank you for registering, {$user->username}.
An email was sent to “{$user->email}” containing a one-time link to verify your account and ultimately completing your registration.

Thank you for registering, {$user->username}.
Your account is awating approval from an administrator.
A notification will be sent once your account has been approved.

Thank you for registering, {$user->username}.
Your registration is now completed.
Your user account is not activated yet. You must complete the activation process first.

Limitation of liability for internal content

The content of our website has been compiled with meticulous care and to the best of our knowledge. However, we cannot assume any liability for the up-to-dateness, completeness or accuracy of any of the pages.

Pursuant to section 7, para. 1 of the TMG (Telemediengesetz – Tele Media Act by German law), we as service providers are liable for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws. However, pursuant to sections 8 to 10 of the TMG, we as service providers are not under obligation to monitor external information provided or stored on our website. Once we have become aware of a specific infringement of the law, we will immediately remove the content in question. Any liability concerning this matter can only be assumed from the point in time at which the infringement becomes known to us.

Limitation of liability for external links

Our website contains links to the websites of third parties (“external links”). As the content of these websites is not under our control, we cannot assume any liability for such external content. In all cases, the provider of information of the linked websites is liable for the content and accuracy of the information provided. At the point in time when the links were placed, no infringements of the law were recognisable to us. As soon as an infringement of the law becomes known to us, we will immediately remove the link in question.

Copyright

The content and works published on this website are governed by the copyright laws of Germany. Any duplication, processing, distribution or any form of utilisation beyond the scope of copyright law shall require the prior written consent of the author or authors in question.

Data protection

A visit to our website can result in the storage on our server of information about the access (date, time, page accessed). This does not represent any analysis of personal data (e.g., name, address or e-mail address). If personal data are collected, this only occurs – to the extent possible – with the prior consent of the user of the website. Any forwarding of the data to third parties without the express consent of the user shall not take place.

We would like to expressly point out that the transmission of data via the Internet (e.g., by e-mail) can offer security vulnerabilities. It is therefore impossible to safeguard the data completely against access by third parties. We cannot assume any liability for damages arising as a result of such security vulnerabilities.

The use by third parties of all published contact details for the purpose of advertising is expressly excluded. We reserve the right to take legal steps in the case of the unsolicited sending of advertising information; e.g., by means of spam mail.

Source: Mustervorlage.net

category.name: wcf.user.avatar
category.item: The administrators {if $__wcf->user->avatarID || $__wcf->user->enableGravatar}have banned your avatar and {/if}disallowed you from using an avatar{if $__wcf->user->disableAvatarReason}: {$__wcf->user->disableAvatarReason}{/if}.
The scaled versions of your avatar are based on a square cutout. You may specify an individual cutout by holding down your mouse button and moving the highlighted area to the desired position.

You may use the following file extensions “{"\n"|str_replace:', ':$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.profile.avatar.allowedFileExtensions')}” for your avatar with a maximum file size of {@$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.profile.avatar.maxSize')|filesize}. The minimum dimensions are 48×48 pixel, it is recommended to provide a dimension of {@MAX_AVATAR_WIDTH}×{@MAX_AVATAR_HEIGHT} pixel. Any avatar that exceeds this limit will be scaled down if possible.
Gravatar (Global Recognized Avatar) provides a globally reusable avatar connected with your email address “{$__wcf->user->email}”. Visit www.gravatar.com to set up or change your avatar.
Your email address is not connected with a gravatar.
Your currently used avatar will be deleted.
Image does not match the allowed file extensions.
Image dimensions are below the minimum sizes.
